node.detail_zh: 患者無外遊紀錄，7 月 18 日出現症狀，於 7 月 14 日曾到屯門富臨酒家。
node.detail_en: The patient has no recent travel history, developed symptoms on July 18, and had beeen to Fulum Restaurant, Tuen Mun Central Square, Tuen Mun on July 14.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_zh: 屯門中央廣場富臨酒家
groups.name_en:
Tuen Mun Central Square Fulum
Restaurant
groups.description_zh: 7 月 11 日在屯門中央廣場富臨酒家舉行的 20  席生日聚會，及後有多名出席者確診。另外也有不同日子到訪該富臨酒家的食客確診。
groups.description_en: A birthday celebration event with 20 tables was held on Jul 11 at Fulum Restaurant, Tuen Mun Central Square. Some of the participants were found to be confirmed cases. There are some confirmed cases had visited the same restaurant.

node.location_zh: 屯門中央廣場 富臨酒家
node.location_en: Tuen Mun Central Square Fulum Restaurant
Tin Lok House, Tin King Estate
